Package org.intermine.bio.postprocess

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BioPAXPostProcess
    Copy over Protein.pathways to Gene.pathways
    BiosegIndexTask
    A task to create a bioseg GIST index on the location table to help with overlap queries.
    CalculateLocations
    Calculate additional mappings between annotation after loading into genomic ObjectStore.
    CreateFlankingRegions
    Create features to represent flanking regions of configurable distance either side of gene features.
    CreateFlyBaseLinkIns
    Create file to send to FlyBase to link in to each FBGN...
    CreateModMineMetaDataCache
    Runs queries to count features, etc per submission and experiment used for display in modMine webapp.
    CreateReferences
    Fill in additional references/collections in genomic model
    EnsemblGwasDbPostprocess
    Update GWAS objects with name and firstAuthor from referenced publication.
    FlyAtlasPostProcess
    Fill in the Gene.microArrayResults collection from Gene.probeSets.results
    FlyBasePostProcess
    Copy transcript.introns to gene.introns.
    FlyBaseUniProtRefsTask
    Task to read a file mapping cds identifiers to UniProt accession numbers and create a protein reference in the CDSs.
    GoPostprocess
    Take any GOAnnotation objects assigned to proteins and copy them to corresponding genes.
    HomophilaPostProcess
    Annotate drosophila genes with diseases related via homophila.
    IntergenicRegionUtil
    Methods for creating feature for intergenic regions.
    IntronUtil
    Methods for creating feature for introns.
    MagePostProcess
    Code to fix references in the classes from the mage source.
    OverlapUtil
    Utility methods for finding overlaps.
    OverlapViewTask
    A task the replace the sequencefeatureoverlappingfeatures table with a view that uses the bioseg type to calculate the overlaps.
    PostProcessOperationsTask
    Run operations on genomic model database after DataLoading
    PostProcessUtil
    Common operations for post processing.
    SetCollectionCounts
    SetCollectionCounts class
    TransferSequences
    Transfer sequences from the Assembly objects to the other objects that are located on the Assemblys and to the objects that the Assemblys are located on (eg.
    UpdateOrthologues
    Orthologues from INPARANOID are attched to Proteins not Genes, this class finds all Orthologues and Paralogues on Proteins and creates references to to corresponding Genes, duplicating the [Orth|Para]logues if the Protein references multiple Genes.
